Spellcasting.name: 施法Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
该[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展下列法术之一，无需姿势或材料部件，并使用感知作为施法关键属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术 thaumaturgy}

各1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{鹰眼术 clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{疗伤术 cure wounds} (6环版本), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFlameStrik]{焰击术 flame strike} (6环版本), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGeas000000]{指使术 geas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTrueSeeing]{真知术 true seeing}

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的1分钟效应。

改变眼睛。 你在1分钟内改变自己眼睛的外观。

洪亮嗓音。 你的声音在1分钟内变得比平时响亮三倍。在持续时间内，你在[[/item Claw]]检定上具有优势。

火焰戏法。 你在1分钟内使火焰闪烁、变亮、变暗或改变颜色。

隐形之手。 你使一扇未上锁的门或窗瞬间猛地打开或关上。

幻音术。 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。

震颤。 你在1分钟内使地面产生无害的震颤。

Clairvoyance.name: 鹰眼术clairvoyance
Clairvoyance.description:
你在射程范围内创造一个{隐形 Invisible}传感器，该处可以是你熟悉的地点（你曾到访过或看见过的地方），也可以是你不熟悉的显眼处（比如一扇门后，拐角位置或树林里）。这一无形体且不受伤害的传感器会在{持续时间 Duration}内停留在该地。

施展该{法术 Spell}时，选择观察或聆听。你可以通过传感器以所选的感官方式感测，如同你处在它的{空间 space}。你可以用一个{附赠动作 Bonus Action}在观察和聆听之间切换。

能看见该传感器的{生物 Creature}（例如受益于{识破隐形see invisibility}或&Reference[truesight]的{生物 Creature}）会看到一个发光的{法球 Orb}，其大小约等于你的拳头。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于2d8加你施法关键属性调整值的生命值。

使用更高法术位。使用的法术位每比1环高一环，治疗量就增加2d8。

Flame Strike.name: 焰击术flame strike
Flame Strike.description:
一支辉煌火焰的垂直立柱从上方呼啸着降落。位于以施法范围内一点为中心，半径10尺、高40尺柱状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败者将受到5d6火焰伤害和5d6光耀伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半伤害。

使用更高法术位。使用的法术位每比5环高一环，火焰伤害和光耀伤害就各增加1d6。

Geas.name: 指使术geas
Geas.description:
你对施法距离内你能看见的一个生物下达言语命令，命令其执行某种服务，或按照你的决定克制某个动作或一系列行动。目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则在该法术的持续时间内陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态。如果目标无法理解你的命令，则其自动在豁免中成功。

被魅惑期间，如果该生物以直接违背你命令的方式行动，则受到[[/damage 5d10 type=psychic]]伤害。该伤害一日至多生效一次。

你可以下达任何你选择的命令，但不能是会导致必死结果的行为。如果你下达自杀指令，则该法术终止。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{移除诅咒 Remove Curse}、@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术 Greater Restoration}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{祈愿术 Wish}法术可以终止此法术。

使用更高法术位。如果你使用7环或8环法术位施展该法术，则其持续时间为365天。如果你使用9环法术位，则该法术持续至被上述法术之一终止为止。

Under Orders.name: 受指使
Under Orders.description: 当生物处于&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态时，若其行为与你的{命令术 command}直接相悖，则受到[[/damage 5d10 type=psyhic]]伤害。该伤害一日至多生效一次。

True Seeing.name: 真知术 True Seeing
True Seeing.description: 法术持续时间内，你触碰的自愿生物具有120尺{真实视觉 Truesight}。

Half-Dragon.name: 半龙
Half-Dragon.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Draconic Origin.name: 龙语起源
Draconic Origin.description:
该[[lookup @name lowercase]]与一种龙类相关，该龙类与以下伤害类型之一相关联（由DM选择）：强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电或毒素。此选择会影响资料卡的其他方面。

Foundry 注

此特性提供一个主动效果，用于在角色卡的效果标签页中管理伤害抗性：。概述的抗性需要手动启用/失能。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次[[/item .mmClaw0000000000]]攻击。

Dragon's Breath.name: 龙息术
Dragon's Breath.description:
敏捷豁免: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]], 每个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]在[[lookup @target.template.size activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]尺锥状区域内。

失败: [[/damage average]]点根据龙语起源特性选择的伤害类型伤害。

成功: 半额伤害。

Leap.name: 跳跃
Leap.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]通过[[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]]向上跳跃[[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]]尺。

Harpy.name: 鸟妖
Harpy.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Luring Song.name: 诱引之歌
Luring Song.description:
该[[lookup @name lowercase]]吟唱一段魔法旋律，其效果持续至该[[lookup @name lowercase]]对其失去{专注 concentration}为止。

感知豁免：DC[[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]，当歌声响起时，位于该[[lookup @name lowercase]]为源点[[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]尺{光环 emanation}范围内的每个[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]均需进行豁免。

豁免失败：目标获得&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态直至歌声结束，并在其每个自己的回合结束时重复进行豁免。处于{魅惑 Charmed}状态期间，目标同时获得&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态且会忽略其他{鸟妖 harpies}的诱人歌声。

若目标距离该[[lookup @name lowercase]]超过5尺，则目标会在其回合内沿最直接路径向该[[lookup @name lowercase]]移动，试图进入其5尺范围内。该移动不会规避&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]；但在进入危险{地形 terrain}（例如岩浆或陷坑）前以及受到该[[lookup @name lowercase]]之外来源造成的{伤害 damage}时，目标会重复进行豁免。

豁免成功：目标在24小时内对该[[lookup @name lowercase]]的诱人歌声{免疫 immune}。

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑 & 失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
目标获得&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态直至歌曲结束，并在每个自己的回合结束时重复豁免。

处于魅惑状态时，目标获得&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态。

Hawk.name: 鹰
Hawk.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Hell Hound.name: 地狱犬
Hell Hound.description:
地狱犬

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.sTelJLU6cHPQ8gzx caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]的至少一名盟友位于该生物5尺内且该盟友不具有{失能 Incapacitated}状态, 则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的{攻击检定 Attack Roll}具有{优势 advantage}。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次[[/item .mmBite0000000000]]攻击。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]], 每个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]在[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]尺锥状区域内。

失败: [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功: 半数伤害。

Hezrou.name: 狂战魔
Hezrou.description:
狂战魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.GK0Mj5JDYx9OSir8 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

代币艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Demonic Restoration.name: 恶魔恢复
Demonic Restoration.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]在无底深渊之外死亡，它的身体会溶解成腐液，并立即在无底深渊某处获得一个新身体，以{全部 生命值}复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]为抵抗法术或其他魔法效应而作的豁免具有优势。

Stench.name: 恶臭
Stench.description:
体质豁免：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]，任何在[[lookup @name lowercase]]周围[[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]尺光环内开始其回合的生物（[[lookup @name lowercase]]除外）。

失败：目标获得&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态直到其下一回合开始。

成功：目标在1小时内对所有[[lookup @name lowercase]]的恶臭效果免疫。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 目标陷入&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态直到其下一回合开始。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动三次[[/item .mmRend0000000000]]攻击。

Leap.name: 跳跃
Leap.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]通过[[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]]向上跳跃[[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]]尺。

Hill Giant.name: 山丘巨人
Hill Giant.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次攻击，使用[[/item .mmTreeClub000000]]或[[/item .mmTrashLob000000]]的任意组合。

Tree Club.name: 树短棒
Tree Club.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。如果目标是大型或更小的生物，它将具有&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 如果目标是大型或更小的生物，它将陷入&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态。

Trash Lob.name: 垃圾投掷
Trash Lob.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态直到其下一回合结束。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 目标陷入&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态直到其下个回合结束。

Hippogriff.name: 鹫马
Hippogriff.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]飞出敌人触及范围时，不会引发&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{借机攻击 Opportunity Attack}。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次[[/item .mmRend0000000000]]攻击。

Hold Breath.name: 屏息Hold Breath
Hold Breath.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以屏住呼吸10分钟。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次[[/item .mmBite0000000000]]攻击。

Hobgoblin Captain.name: 大地精船长
Hobgoblin Captain.description:
装备： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{巨剑 Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmHalfPlateA]{半身板甲 Half Plate Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{长弓 Longbow}

大地精

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.eFGs6u803PtWG5k7 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

大地精船长

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.kr2tx1DFAcwGmzKR caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Aura of Authority.name: 权威灵光
Aura of Authority.description: 当位于一个以[[lookup @name lowercase]]为源点、半径[[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]]尺的光环 emanations范围内时，只要[[lookup @name lowercase]]未陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态，[[lookup @name lowercase]]及其盟友 allies在攻击 attack rolls和豁免 saving throws上均具有优势 advantage。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次攻击，使用[[/item .OZvhmmUFMgHZWnGB]]或[[/item .cryc72bvanyjmNdX]]的任意组合。

Hobgoblin Warrior.name: 大地精武者
Hobgoblin Warrior.description:
装备： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmHalfPlateA]{半身板甲 Half Plate Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{长弓 Longbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{长剑 Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmShield0000]{护盾术shield Shield}

大地精

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.eFGs6u803PtWG5k7 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

大地精武者

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.qn7hUk5eNskZNKk9 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

令牌艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Shield.name: 护盾术shield
Shield.description: 仅当你对{护盾术shield Shield}受过训练时，你才能获得其{护甲等级 Armor Class}效益。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]的至少一名盟友在目标生物5尺范围内且该盟友未陷入{失能 Incapacitated}状态，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的{攻击检定 Attack Roll}具有{优势 advantage}。

Homunculus.name: 造妖
Homunculus.description: 代币艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Telepathic Bond.name: 心灵联结
Telepathic Bond.description: 当[[lookup @name lowercase]]与其主人在同一位面时，两者可以通过心灵感应相互交流。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]。命中：[[/damage]]伤害，且目标受到以下效应影响。

体质豁免：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zINRP55nQzeLTh4x]]。

失败：目标获得{中毒 Poisoned}状态直至造妖的下一回合结束。

失败且差值达5或更多：目标获得&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态持续1分钟。处于中毒状态期间，目标同时具有&Reference[Unconscious apply=false]状态，若目标受到任何伤害则该状态提前结束。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 目标获得&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态，直到噬咬者的下一回合结束。在中毒期间，目标获得&Reference[Unconscious apply=false]状态，若目标受到任何伤害则提前结束。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: 中毒期间，目标陷入&Reference[Unconscious apply=false]状态，若目标受到任何伤害则提前结束。

Horned Devil.name: 角魔
Horned Devil.description:
角魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.zZ2RDYRFRDDrRizJ caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

代币艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 创作。

Diabolical Restoration.name: 魔能复苏
Diabolical Restoration.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]在九层地狱之外死亡，它的身体会在硫磺烟雾中消失，并立即在九层地狱某处获得一个新的身体，以{全部 生命值}复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗{法术和其他魔法效应 Spells and other magical effects}的{豁免 Saving Throws}上{具有优势 has advantage}。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次攻击，使用 [[/item .mmSearingFork000]] 或 [[/item .mmHurlFlame00000]] 进行任意组合。它可以用一次 [[/item .mmInfernalTail00]] 来替换其中一次攻击。

Hurl Flame.name: 投掷烈焰Hurl Flame。
Hurl Flame.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。如果目标是一个未被着装或携带的可燃物件，它就会开始燃烧。

Infernal Tail.name: 炼狱尾击
Infernal Tail.description:
敏捷豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]]，一个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在 [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] 内可见。

失败： [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] 伤害，且目标若未拥有炼狱伤口则获得一个。受伤期间，目标在其每回合开始时失去 [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] 生命值。伤口在 [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] 后、法术为目标恢复生命值后、或目标或其5尺内的生物采取动作止血后闭合，止血需通过一次 [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]] 检定成功。

Hunter Shark.name: 寻猎鲨
Hunter Shark.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定: [[/attack]] ([[lookup @activation.condition activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]]), 触及 [[lookup @range.value activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] [[lookup @range.units activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]]. [[/damage average extended]].

attack.condition: 如果目标不具有其全部生命值则具有优势。

Hydra.name: 九头蛇
Hydra.description: 代币艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Multiple Heads.name: 多头
Multiple Heads.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]有五个头。每当该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在单个回合内受到25点或更多伤害时，它的一个头就会死亡。如果该[[lookup @name lowercase]]的所有头都死亡，它就会死亡。在每个自己的回合结束时，若它至少有一个存活的头，且自上个回合以来未受到火焰伤害，则该[[lookup @name lowercase]]会为每个自上个回合以来死亡的头长出两个新头。当该[[lookup @name lowercase]]长出新的头时，它恢复20点生命值。

Reactive Heads.name: 反应头颅
Reactive Heads.description: 对于[[lookup @name lowercase]]拥有的每个超过一个的头颅，它获得一次额外的&Reference[Reaction]，该反应只能用于&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动与其头颅数量相等的[[/item .mmBite0000000000]]攻击。

Hyena.name: 多头蛇蜥
Hyena.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]的至少一名盟友位于该生物5尺内且该盟友没有陷入失能状态，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的{攻击检定 Attack Roll}具有{优势 advantage}。
Pack Tactics.requirements: 攻击目标周围5尺内的盟友。

Ice Devil.name: 冰魔
Ice Devil.description:
冰魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.sA9Jx5SXPoQvmnOO caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

代币艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Diabolical Restoration.name: 魔能复苏
Diabolical Restoration.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]在九层地狱之外死亡，它的身体会在一阵硫磺烟雾中消失，并立即在九层地狱的某处获得一个新的身体，以{生命值 Hit Points}全满的状态复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定上具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动三次[[/item .mmIceSpear000000]]攻击。它可以用一次[[/item .mmTail0000000000]]攻击替换其中一次攻击。

Ice Wall.name: 冰墙术
Ice Wall.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{冰墙术 Wall of Ice}（8环版本），无需任何法术部件并使用智力作为施法关键属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]）。

Wall of Ice.name: 冰墙术
Wall of Ice.description:
你在射程内的一块坚实表面上创造出一面{冰墙术 wall of ice}。你可以将其塑造成一个半球形的{穹顶 dome}或一个半径可达10{尺 feet}的球体，或者你可以塑造一个由十个10{尺 foot}见方的面板组成的平坦表面。每个面板必须与另一个面板相邻。无论何种形式，冰墙厚1{尺 foot}并持续至{持续时间 duration}结束。

如果冰墙出现时穿过一个{生物 creature}的{空间 space}，该{生物 creature}会被推到冰墙的一侧（你选择哪一侧）并进行一次{敏捷豁免 Dexterity saving throw}，{豁免失败 on a failed save}则受到10d6{寒冷伤害 cold damage}，成功则只受一半伤害。

冰墙是一个可以被破坏并因此被突破的{物件 object}。它每10{尺 foot}段具有{护甲等级： AC}12和30{生命值： Hit Points}，并且对{寒冷 Cold}、{毒素 Poison}和{心灵 Psychic}{伤害 damage}{免疫 immunity}，对{火焰 Fire}{伤害 damage}具有{易伤 vulnerability}。将一段10{尺 foot}的冰墙{生命值： Hit Points}降至0会摧毁它，并在冰墙原{在 the}位置留下一片冰冷空气。

一个{生物 creature}在其{回合 turn}中第一次穿过这片冰冷空气时，进行一次{体质豁免 Constitution saving throw}，{豁免失败 on a failed save}则受到5d6{寒冷伤害 cold damage}，成功则只受一半伤害。

使用更高{法术位 spell slot}等级。 冰墙出现时造成的{伤害 damage}每比6环高一环就增加2d6，穿过冰冷空气造成的{伤害 damage}每比6环高一环就增加1d6。

Frigid Air.name: 极寒空气
Frigid Air.condition: 生物在一个回合内首次移动穿过墙壁时

Ice Spear.name: 冰矛
Ice Spear.description:
[[/attack extended]]。

命中： [[/damage average]]伤害。直到其下一回合结束前，目标不能执行&Reference[Bonus Action]或&Reference[Reaction]，其速度减少10尺，且其回合内只能移动或执行一个动作，不能同时执行两者。

命中或失手：发动远程攻击后，该矛会立即魔法般返回[[lookup @name lowercase]]手中。

Speed -10.name: 速度-10
Speed -10.description: 直到其下个回合结束，目标的速度减少10尺。

Ice Mephit.name: 冰魔蝠
Ice Mephit.description:
魔蝠

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.C5AnYUB2Vhu0urqS caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Death Burst.name: 死亡爆发
Death Burst.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]在[[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]时爆炸。

体质豁免：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]，位于[[lookup @name lowercase]]为原点[[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]尺光环范围内的每个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]。

豁免失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

豁免成功：半伤。

Frost Breath.name: 寒霜吐息
Frost Breath.description:
体质豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ChLJgxjftTSMSRHe]], 每个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ChLJgxjftTSMSRHe]]在[[lookup @target.template.size activity=ChLJgxjftTSMSRHe]]尺锥状区域内。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description: 该魔蝠施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]，无需任何法术部件并以魅力作为施法关键属性。

pH1Rf3FfwlD3EELa.name: 云雾术
pH1Rf3FfwlD3EELa.description:
你在施法距离内指定一点，创造一个以该点为中心、半径20尺的球状浓雾。该球状区域为&Reference[heavilyobscured]。浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，或被强风（例如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术 Gust of Wind}创造的风）吹散时提前终止。

使用更高法术位。若使用1环以上法术位施展此法，每比1环高一级，浓雾半径增加20尺。

Imp.name: 小魔鬼
Imp.description:
小魔鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.6c0Aa15WAeqtY3hl caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

代币艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗{法术和其他魔法效应 Spells and other magical effects}的{豁免 Saving Throws}上{具有优势 has advantage}。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]对自身施放@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{隐形术 Invisibility}，无需任何法术部件并使用魅力作为施法关键属性。

BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.name: 隐形术invisibility
BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.description:
你触碰的一个生物获得&Reference[invisible apply=false]状态，直到法术结束。该法术在目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术后立即提前结束。

使用更高法术位。你使用的法术位每比2环高一级，就可以多指定一个目标。

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 该法术在目标进行一次攻击检定、造成伤害或施展一个法术之后立即提前终止。

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]变形为老鼠（速度：20尺）、乌鸦（速度：20尺，飞行60尺）或蜘蛛（速度：20尺，攀爬20尺）的形态，或恢复其真实形态。除速度外，其游戏资料卡在各形态下均保持一致。其所穿戴或携带的任何装备不会随之变形。

Incubus.name: 梦魔
Incubus.description:
梦魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Eqctro3hPZWecGfP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Succubus Form.name: 魅魔形态
Succubus Form.description: 当[[lookup @name lowercase]]完成一次{长休 Long Rest}时，它可以变形为@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSuccubus000000]{魅魔 Succubus}，并使用该{资料卡 stat block}而非此{资料卡 stat block}。其穿着或携带的任何{装备 Equipment}不会被转化。

Restless Touch.name: 无休之触
Restless Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标被诅咒缠身 24小时或直到[[lookup @name lowercase]]死亡。在诅咒结束前，目标无法从完成短休中获得任何效益。

Cursed.name: 诅咒缠身
Cursed.description: 目标将{诅咒缠身 Cursed}24小时，或直到攻击它的生物死亡。在诅咒结束前，目标从完成短休中得不到任何效益。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次[[/item .mmRestlessTouch0]]攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
该[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展下列法术之一，无需材料部件并使用魅力作为施法关键属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{易容术 Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{以太化 Etherealness}

各1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]{托梦术 Dream}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]{催眠图纹 Hypnotic Pattern}

Nightmare.name: 梦魇
Nightmare.description:
感知豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] 个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的，在 [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] 尺内的目标。

失败： 如果目标有 20 或更少的生命值，它将获得 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态，持续 [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]]，直到它受到伤害，或直到一个生物在它 5 尺内用一个动作唤醒它。否则，目标受到 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: 如果目标的生命值为20或更少，它将陷入1小时的&Reference[Unconscious apply=false]状态，直到它受到伤害，或5尺内的一个生物用一个动作唤醒它。

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你让自己——包括你的{服饰 clothing}、{护甲 armor}、{武器 weapons}和你身上的{其他 other}物品——在法术终止前看起来与众不同。你可以显得比正常状态矮1{尺 foot}{或 or}高1{尺 foot}，也可以显得更胖{或 or}更瘦。你必须采用与自身肢体基本结构相同的外形。除此之外，幻象的具体程度由你决定。

该法术造成的变化经不起物理检验。例如，如果你用法术为服装添加一顶帽子，物体可以穿过帽子，且任何触摸它的人都不会感觉到任何东西。

要识破你的伪装，一个{生物 Creature}必须执行{研究 Study}{动作 Action}来检视你的外貌，并在一次对抗你{法术豁免DC spell save DC}的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]]{检定 check}中成功。

Disguised.name: 易容
Disguised.description: 如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个{研究 Study}动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你{法术豁免DC spell save DC}的[[/check ability=int skill=inv]]检定。

Etherealness.name: 以太化etherealness
Etherealness.description:
你进入以太位面与你当前位面重叠的边缘区域。你在法术持续时间内一直呆在边界以太。在此期间，你可以向任意方向移动。如果你向上或向下移动，则你移动的每尺距离需要额外消耗一尺的移动力。你可以观察你离开的位面，该位面呈现灰色，且你看不到该位面中60尺外的任何事物。

身处以太位面时，你只能影响该位面上的生物、物体和效应，也只会被它们影响。不在以太位面上的生物无法感知你或与你互动，除非其特性赋予其此能力。

当法术结束时，你会回到你离开的位面上与你在边界以太中所处空间对应的位置。如果你出现在一个已占据空间，你将被弹射到最近的未占据空间，并受到力场伤害，数值等于你被移动尺数的两倍。

如果你在以太位面或与其不接壤的位面（例如外层位面之一）施展此法术后，该法术将立即终止。

使用更高法术位。你使用7环以上法术位施展该法术时，每比7环高一环就可以额外指定至多三个自愿生物（包括你自己）作为目标。这些生物必须在你施法时处于你周围10尺范围内。

Dream.name: 托梦术dream
Dream.description:
你以同一位面中一个你认识的生物为目标。你或一个你触及的自愿生物进入出神状态以作为梦境信使。在出神期间，信使处于&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态且速度为0。

如果目标正睡着，则信使可以在法术持续时间内出现在其梦中并在其沉睡期间与之交流。信使能够塑造梦中的环境，创造景观，物件和其他影像。信使可以随时结束出神状态，以此终止法术。目标在醒来后能清楚地记得其梦境的内容。

如果你施法时目标醒着，则信使可以了解到这点。此时信使可以终止出神并结束法术，或是等待目标入睡再进入其梦境。

你可以让信使对目标显得恐怖。若你如此做，信使可以传递一条不超过十个词的信息，随后目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标无法从其休息中获得任何效益，并在醒来时受到3d6心灵伤害。

Trance State.name: 出神状态
Trance State.description: 在出神期间，信使陷入{失能 Incapacitated}状态且{速度 Speed}为0。

Hypnotic Pattern.name: 催眠图纹
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
你在施法距离内一处边长 30 尺的立方区域内创造出一个扭曲的彩色图纹。图纹在出现片刻后消失。区域内每个看到该图纹的生物必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed apply=false]状态。在被魅惑期间，该生物陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态，且速度为 0。

受术生物受到任何伤害，或者其他生物用一个动作将其摇醒时，该法术对该生物的效应即告终止。

Hypnotized.name: 被催眠
Hypnotized.description:
当&Reference[charmed apply=false]时，该生物处于&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态且速度为0。

如果受影响的生物受到任何伤害，或有其他生物用一个动作将其从恍惚中摇醒，则法术对其终止。

Invisible Stalker.name: 隐形追猎者
Invisible Stalker.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Air Form.name: 空气形态
Air Form.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以进入敌人的空间并在那里停下。它可以通过窄至1英寸的空间而无需为此消耗额外移动力。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动三次[[/item .mmWindSwipe00000]]攻击。它可以用一次[[/item .mmVortex00000000]]来替换其中一次攻击。

Vortex.name: 涡旋
Vortex.description:
体质豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]], [[lookup @name lowercase]]空间内的一个[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]]伤害，且目标获得&Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。直到受擒状态结束，目标无法施展带有言语部件的法术，并在[[lookup @name lowercase]]的每个回合开始时受到[[/damage average activity=kDz92inkRCjGrPiz]]伤害。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description:
目标获得&Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]，具体DC见来源物品）。

在受擒状态结束前，目标无法施展带有言语部件的法术，并在该NPC每回合开始时受到额外伤害。

Iron Golem.name: 钢铁魔像
Iron Golem.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Fire Absorption.name: 火焰吸收
Fire Absorption.description: 每当[[lookup @name lowercase]]受到火焰伤害时，它会恢复等同于该火焰伤害数值的生命值。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定上具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动两次攻击，使用[[/item Bladed Arm]]或[[/item Fiery Bolt]]的任意组合。

Poison Breath.name: 毒素吐息
Poison Breath.description:
体质豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]，位于[[lookup @target.template.size activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]尺[[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]内的每个生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Jackal.name: 豺狗
Jackal.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Killer Whale.name: 虎鲸
Killer Whale.description: 艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Hold Breath.name: 屏息Hold Breath
Hold Breath.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以屏住呼吸30分钟。

Knight.name: 骑士
Knight.description:
装备: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{巨剑 Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepHeavyCross]{重弩 Heavy Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{板甲 Plate Armor}

骑士

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.G5uYpVQgKpPIkFQY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

骑士

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.8ypc00V48Je5p3JY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

令牌艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次攻击，使用[[/item .qFzUqCv1LU1T2l9W]]或[[/item .iqOpigRADMF7BFDu]]的任意组合。

Parry.name: 格挡Parry
Parry.description: 触发: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]处于[[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]状态。 响应: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在其护甲等级上增加[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]以对抗该次攻击，可能导致攻击未命中。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 持用武器时被一次近战攻击检定命中

Kobold Warrior.name: 狗头人武者
Kobold Warrior.description:
装备： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{匕首 Daggers (3)}

狗头人

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.NC8c3St0SoWBP6K8 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

狗头人武者

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.khL20BavkkD4YZGY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

令牌艺术作品由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]的至少一名盟友位于该生物5尺内，且该盟友未处于{失能 Incapacitated}状态，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的{攻击检定 Attack Roll}具有{优势 advantage}。
Pack Tactics.requirements: 攻击目标5尺范围内的盟友

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 处于阳光下时，[[lookup @name lowercase]]在属性检定和攻击检定中具有劣势。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖Amphibious
Amphibious.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性 Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Siege Monster.name: 攻城怪物Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmTentacle000000]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item .mmFling000000000]]、[[/item .mmLightningStrik]] 或 [[/item .mmSwallow0000000]]。

Tentacle.name: 触须
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。 目标获得&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），该状态来自十条触手中的一条，且目标获得&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态直至受擒状态结束。

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒与束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
目标因十条触手中的一条而获得&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]，具体DC见来源物品），并且在受擒结束前持续处于&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态。

逃脱检定（具体DC见来源物品）

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Fling.name: 投掷
Fling.description:
该[[lookup @name lowercase]]将一个被其[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]]擒抱的目标投掷到其自身[[lookup @range.value activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]]尺[[lookup @range.special activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]]内一个它能看见的空间。

敏捷豁免: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]], 被投掷的生物和目的地空间中的每个生物。

失败: [[/damage average]]伤害, 且目标获得&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态。

成功: 一半伤害。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 目标陷入&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态。

Lightning Strike.name: 闪电打击
Lightning Strike.description:
敏捷豁免: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], 一个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以看到在[[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] 尺内。

失败: [[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功: 半数伤害。

Swallow.name: 吞咽
Swallow.description:
敏捷豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] 被[[lookup @name lowercase]]擒抱（它一次最多可以吞下四个生物）。

失败： [[/damage average activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]]伤害。如果目标是大型或更小的，它被吞下并且不再受擒。被吞下的生物具有&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态，对[[lookup @name lowercase]]之外的攻击和其他效果具有&Reference[Total Cover]，并在其每个回合开始时受到[[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]]伤害。

如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]在一个回合内从体内的一个生物处受到50点或更多伤害，[[lookup @name lowercase]]必须在该回合结束时进行一次[[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]]豁免，否则将吐出所有被吞下的生物，每个生物落在[[lookup @name lowercase]]10尺范围内的一个空间，并具有&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态。如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]死亡，任何被吞下的生物不再具有束缚状态，并且可以使用15尺移动从尸体中逃脱，脱离倒地状态。

Save.name: 豁免
Save.affectsSpecial: 一个大型或更小的生物受擒

Restrained & Total Cover.name: Restrained & Total Cover
Restrained & Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[Total Cover apply=false] against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Escape: Prone.name: Escape: Prone
Escape: Prone.description: Any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Toxic Ink.name: Toxic Ink
Toxic Ink.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is underwater.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then moves up to its Speed.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Blinded & Poisoned.name: Blinded & Poisoned
Blinded & Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Lamia.name: Lamia
Lamia.description:
Lamia

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Lawk1h1Wf49rxX8U caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmCorruptingTouc]].

Corrupting Touch.name: Corrupting Touch
Corrupting Touch.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions.

Cursed, Charmed & Poisoned.name: Cursed, Charmed & Poisoned
Cursed, Charmed & Poisoned.description: Until the curse ends, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} (can appear as a Large or Medium biped), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGeas000000]{Geas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Geas.name: Geas
Geas.description:
You give a verbal command to a creature that you can see within range, ordering it to carry out some service or refrain from an action or a course of activity as you decide. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target automatically succeeds if it can't understand your command.

While Charmed, the creature takes [[/damage 5d10 type=psychic]] damage if it acts in a manner directly counter to your command. It takes this damage no more than once each day.

You can issue any command you choose, short of an activity that would result in certain death. Should you issue a suicidal command, the spell ends.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell ends this spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. If you use a level 7 or 8 spell slot, the duration is 365 days. If you use a level 9 spell slot, the spell lasts until it is ended by one of the spells mentioned above.

Under Orders.name: Under Orders
Under Orders.description: While &Reference[Charmed apply=false], the creature takes [[/damage 5d10 type=psyhic]] damage if it acts in a manner directly counter to your command. It takes this damage no more than once each day.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can't deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Lemure.name: Lemure
Lemure.description:
Lemures

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.StGSoy9GntE0mCiY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Lemure

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.HJOkVF1j68fs3m7Y caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Hellish Restoration.name: Hellish Restoration
Hellish Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

Lich.name: Lich
Lich.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagComponentPo]{Component Pouch}

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Component Pouch.name: Component Pouch
Component Pouch.description: A Component Pouch is watertight and filled with compartments that hold all the free Material components of your spells.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Spirit Jar.name: Spirit Jar
Spirit Jar.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s lair.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .6qvUZeTimud7ekV8]] or [[/item .9p8yotv4r7nt3NWl]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplChainLight]{Chain Lightning}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFingerofDe]{Finger of Death}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPowerWordK]{Power Word Kill}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Animate Dead.name: Animate Dead
Animate Dead.description:
Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small Humanoid within range. The target becomes an Undead creature: a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{Skeleton} if you chose bones or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{Zombie} if you chose a corpse.

On each of your turns, you can take a Bonus Action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move on its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the Dodge action and moves only to avoid harm. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete.

The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you've given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell rather than animating a new creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You animate or reassert control over two additional Undead creatures for each spell slot level above 3. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You launch a lightning bolt toward a target you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets of your choice, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d8 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. One additional bolt leaps from the first target to another target for each spell slot level above 6.

Finger of Death.name: Finger of Death
Finger of Death.description:
You unleash negative energy toward a creature you can see within range. The target makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 7d8 + 30 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

A Humanoid killed by this spell rises at the start of your next turn as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{Zombie} (see appendix B) that follows your verbal orders.

Power Word Kill.name: Power Word Kill
Power Word Kill.description: You compel one creature you can see within range to die. If the target has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, it takes 12d12 Psychic damage.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Protective Magic.name: Protective Magic
Protective Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Deathly Teleport.name: Deathly Teleport
Deathly Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]]. [[lookup @range.special activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]], and each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]]. of the space it left takes [[/damage average]] damage.

damage.rangeSpecial: to an unoccupied space it can see

Disrupt Life.name: Disrupt Life
Disrupt Life.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]] that isn't an Undead in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Frightening Gaze.name: Frightening Gaze
Frightening Gaze.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFear000000]{Fear}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description:
Each creature in a 30-foot Cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and have the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition for the duration.

A Frightened creature takes the &Reference[dash] action and moves away from you by the safest route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a space where it doesn't have line of sight to you, the creature makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends on that creature.

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description: A &Reference[frightened apply=false] creature takes the &Reference[dash] action and moves away from you by the safest route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a space where it doesn’t have line of sight to you, the creature makes a [[/save ability=wis]] saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends on that creature.

Paralyzing Touch.name: Paralyzing Touch
Paralyzing Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
Pack Tactics.requirements: Ally within 5 feet of attack target

Running Leap.name: Running Leap
Running Leap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmRoar0000000000]].

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbafcWand000000]{Wand}

Mages

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.BRPgUa1VGeHBz5BR caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Mage

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.G2fA16d9pkedAKnr caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmArcaneBurst000]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 4 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplConeofCold]{Cone of Cold}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

BtkwckQJktc8hRh0.name: Misty Step
BtkwckQJktc8hRh0.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Protective Magic.name: Protective Magic
Protective Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.description:
You unleash a blast of cold air. Each creature in a 60-foot Cone originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Magma Mephit.description:

Petrifying Gaze.description:

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

While cursed, the target can’t regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn’t return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s lair. The heart is a Tiny object that has AC 17, HP 10, and Immunity to all damage except Fire.

A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.
