Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +9 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHarm000000]{Harm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInsectPlag]{Insect Plague} (level 7 version)

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Animate Dead.name: Animate Dead
Animate Dead.description:
Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small Humanoid within range. The target becomes an Undead creature: a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{Skeleton} if you chose bones or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{Zombie} if you chose a corpse.

On each of your turns, you can take a Bonus Action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move on its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the Dodge action and moves only to avoid harm. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete.

The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you've given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell rather than animating a new creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You animate or reassert control over two additional Undead creatures for each spell slot level above 3. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.

Harm.name: Harm
Harm.description: You unleash virulent magic on a creature you can see within range. The target makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 14d6 Necrotic damage, and its Hit Point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage it took. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only. This spell can't reduce a target's Hit Point maximum below 1.

Insect Plague.name: Insect Plague
Insect Plague.description:
Swarming locusts fill a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The Sphere remains for the duration, and its area is &Reference[LightlyObscured] and &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

When the swarm appears, each creature in it makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 4d10 Piercing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature also makes this save when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 5.

Whirlwind of Sand.name: Whirlwind of Sand
Whirlwind of Sand.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. Each creature of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Expend Use.name: Expend Use
Expend Use.condition: The attacking creature is hit by an attack roll
Expend Use.affectsSpecial: to an unoccupied space it can see

+2 AC.name: +2 AC
+2 AC.description: The attacking creature adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: Each creature of the attacking creature's choice that it can see within 5 ft. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=long] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Dread Command.name: Dread Command
Dread Command.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command} (level 2 version), using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn't move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Necrotic Strike.name: Necrotic Strike
Necrotic Strike.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmRottingFist000]] or [[/item .d6GVHcFrHv83C7eS]] attack.

Dreadful Glare.name: Dreadful Glare
Dreadful Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the attacking creature's next turn.

Nalfeshnee.name: Nalfeshnee
Nalfeshnee.description:
Nalfeshnee

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.bG2lzFCLqlpghJF8 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Horror Nimbus.name: Horror Nimbus
Horror Nimbus.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] out of line of sight.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the attacking creature out of line of sight.

Pursuit.name: Pursuit
Pursuit.description: Trigger: Another creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see ends its move within [[lookup @range.value activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Teleport, but its destination space must be [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]].

Expend Use.name: Expend Use
Expend Use.affectsSpecial: within 10 feet of the triggering creature

Night Hag.name: Night Hag
Night Hag.description:
Night Hag

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.OZ4pczqo9wAgj4CD caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Coven Magic.name: Coven Magic
Coven Magic.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description:
You receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about the results of a course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes. The DM chooses the omen from the Omens table.

OmenFor Results That Will Be …
WealGood
WoeBad
Weal and woeGood and bad
IndifferenceNeither good nor bad

The spell doesn't account for circumstances, such as other spells, that might change the results.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

Locate Object.name: Locate Object
Locate Object.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Unseen Servant.name: Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.description:
This spell creates an Invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and a Strength of 2, and it can't attack. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends.

Once on each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring drinks. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.

If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Soul Bag.name: Soul Bag
Soul Bag.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile} (level 4 version)

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPhantasmal]{Phantasmal Killer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only)

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Nightmare Haunting.name: Nightmare Haunting
Nightmare Haunting.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell's messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s soul bag, and the target can't be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.description:
You target a creature you know on the same plane of existence. You or a willing creature you touch enters a trance state to act as a dream messenger. While in the trance, the messenger is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and has a Speed of 0.

If the target is asleep, the messenger appears in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the spell's duration. The messenger can also shape the dream's environment, creating landscapes, objects, and other images. The messenger can emerge from the trance at any time, ending the spell. The target recalls the dream perfectly upon waking.

If the target is awake when you cast the spell, the messenger knows it and can either end the trance (and the spell) or wait for the target to sleep, at which point the messenger enters its dreams.

You can make the messenger terrifying to the target. If you do so, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words, and then the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and it takes 3d6 Psychic damage when it wakes up.

Trance State.name: Trance State
Trance State.description: While in the trance, the messenger is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description:
You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can perceive the plane you left, which looks gray, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can affect and be affected only by creatures, objects, and effects on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive or interact with you unless a feature gives them the ability to do so.

When the spell ends, you return to the plane you left in the spot that corresponds to your space in the Border Ethereal. If you appear in an occupied space, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take Force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.

This spell ends instantly if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.You can target up to three willing creatures (including yourself) for each spell slot level above 7. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

Phantasmal Killer.name: Phantasmal Killer
Phantasmal Killer.description:
You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusion of its deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d10 Psychic damage and has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the spell ends.

For the duration, the target makes a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a failed save, it takes the Psychic damage again. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 4.

Fears Manifested.name: Fears Manifested
Fears Manifested.description:
The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls for the duration.

For the duration, the target makes a [[/save ability=wis]] saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a failed save, it takes the Psychic damage again. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description:
Nightmare

Confer Fire Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Resistance: Fire.name: Resistance: Fire
Resistance: Fire.description: The creature can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the creature.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

Ethereal Stride.name: Ethereal Stride
Ethereal Stride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] [[lookup @range.units activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]]. of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmBreastplat]{Breastplate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Rotting Gaze.name: Rotting Gaze
Rotting Gaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Weird Insight.name: Weird Insight
Weird Insight.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] feet.

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Split.name: Split
Split.description:
Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]]

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

Split.name: Split
Split.condition: is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage.

Compression.name: Compression
Compression.description: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without spending extra movement to do so.

Ink Cloud.name: Ink Cloud
Ink Cloud.description: Trigger: A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater. Response: The octopus releases ink that fills a 5-foot Cube centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is &Reference[heavilyobscured] for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

Obscure Area.name: Obscure Area
Obscure Area.condition: a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage.

mmCompression000.name: Compression
mmCompression000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmTentacles00000.name: Tentacles
mmTentacles00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from all four tentacles.

Ogre.name: Ogre
Ogre.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepGreatclub0]{Greatclub}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins (3)}

Undead Fortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

Oni.name: Oni

Oni

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] or [[/item .mmNightmareRay00]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmSpellcasting00]].

Nightmare Ray.name: Nightmare Ray
Nightmare Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid or a Large Giant, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person} (level 2 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

7zCgLqwWT0prZxhy.name: Invisibility
7zCgLqwWT0prZxhy.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Charm Person.name: Charm Person
Charm Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target's only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can't talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can't be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can't attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description:
Each creature of your choice in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the &Reference[unconscious] condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell's effect.

Creatures that don't sleep, such as elves, or that have Immunity to the Exhaustion condition automatically succeed on saves against this spell.

Sleeping.name: Sleeping
Sleeping.description: 你直至下一回合结束前陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{失能}状态。在下一回合结束时，你必须重复此豁免。若你的豁免再次失败，你在持续时间内陷入&Reference[unconscious]{昏迷}如果你受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将你摇醒，你自身上的法术结束。

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and two [[/item Tentacle]] attacks.

Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=tKShuY4vDM7tn9aC]].

Failure: The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/damage 1d10 average]] and doesn't return to normal until the Poisoned condition ends on the target.

Success: The Poisoned condition ends.

save.condition: Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest

Poisoned.name: Poisoned

Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two tentacles.

Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't provoke an &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Rapier.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

Advantage: Next Attack.name: Advantage: Next Attack
Advantage: Next Attack.description: On a hit with its rapier on the current attack, the attacking creature has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

Pistol.name: 手铳
Pistol.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 30/90 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .SHobhYTtELnIVQHw]] or [[/item .y2po5bpBbyIFIuVO]] in any combination.

Riposte.name: Riposte
Riposte.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

+3 AC.name: +3 AC
+3 AC.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Diabolical Restoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
Diabolical Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Fear Aura.name: Fear Aura
Fear Aura.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emanates an aura in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=oT8238p9jXwVy76c]]-foot Emanation while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=oT8238p9jXwVy76c]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=oT8238p9jXwVy76c]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s aura for 24 hours.

save.affectsSpecial: any enemy that starts its turn in the aura

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack, two [[/item .mmDevilishClaw00]] attacks, and one [[/item .mmFieryMace00000]] attack.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it must make the following saving throw.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fM7YmQ4hBtRXJkMe]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points and takes [[/damage average activity=aa2GUeTEVLOdmfrB]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

Hellfire Spellcasting.name: Hellfire Spellcasting
Hellfire Spellcasting.description: The pit fiend casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).. It can replace one Fireball with @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster} (level 7 version) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Hold Monster.name: Hold Monster
Hold Monster.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 5.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Wall of Fire.name: 火墙术
Wall of Fire.description:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 Fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Divine Awareness.name: Divine Awareness
Divine Awareness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie.

Exalted Restoration.name: Exalted Restoration
Exalted Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item Radiant Sword]] attacks or uses [[/item Holy Burst]] twice.

Holy Burst.name: Holy Burst
Holy Burst.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommune000]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRaiseDead0]{Raise Dead}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Commune.name: Commune
Commune.description:
You contact a deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with yes or no. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. You receive a correct answer for each question.

Divine beings aren't necessarily omniscient, so you might receive "unclear" as an answer if a question pertains to information that lies beyond the deity's knowledge. In a case where a one-word answer could be misleading or contrary to the deity's interests, the DM might offer a short phrase as an answer instead.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

Control Weather.name: Control Weather
Control Weather.description:
You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell, and it ends early if you go indoors.

When you cast the spell, you change the current weather conditions, which are determined by the DM. You can change precipitation, temperature, and wind. It takes 1d4 × 10 minutes for the new conditions to take effect. Once they do so, you can change the conditions again. When the spell ends, the weather gradually returns to normal.

When you change the weather conditions, find a current condition on the following tables and change its stage by one, up or down. When changing the wind, you can change its direction.

Precipitation
StageCondition
1Clear
2Light clouds
3Overcast or ground fog
4Rain, hail, or snow
5Torrential rain, driving hail, or blizzard
Temperature
StageCondition
1Heat wave
2Hot
3Warm
4Cool
5Cold
6Freezing
Wind
StageCondition
1Calm
2Moderate wind
3Strong wind
4Gale
5Storm

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn't there already. If they aren't on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

Dismissal.name: Dismissal
Dismissal.affectsSpecial: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Break Enchantment.name: Break Enchantment
Break Enchantment.affectsSpecial: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Raise Dead.name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.description:
With a touch, you revive a dead creature if it has been dead no longer than 10 days and it wasn't Undead when it died.

The creature returns to life with 1 Hit Point. This spell also neutralizes any poisons that affected the creature at the time of death.

This spell closes all mortal wounds, but it doesn't restore missing body parts. If the creature is lacking body parts or organs integral for its survival—its head, for instance—the spell automatically fails.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 1)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 2)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 4)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 3)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Remove Curse.name: Remove Curse
Remove Curse.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner's Attunement to the object so it can be removed or discarded.

Hold Breath.name: Hold Breath
Hold Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Priest.name: Priest
Priest.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .hRwqUlEyM9TjOmHy]] or [[/item .mmRadiantFlame00]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Spiritual Weapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
You create a floating, spectral force that resembles a weapon of your choice and lasts for the duration. The force appears within range in a space of your choice, and you can immediately make one melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of the force. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the force up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for every slot level above 2.

Priest Acolyte.name: Priest Acolyte
Priest Acolyte.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
Sanctuary.description: You ward a creature within range. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack roll or a damaging spell must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] or either choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell doesn't protect the warded creature from areas of effect. The spell ends if the warded creature makes an attack roll, casts a spell, or deals damage.

Warded.name: Warded
Warded.description:
Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack roll or a damaging spell must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis format=long]] or either choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.

The spell ends if the warded creature makes an attack roll, casts a spell, or deals damage.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Pseudodragon.name: Pseudodragon
Pseudodragon.description:
Pseudodragon

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.NhqYPD69TqlVJpKV caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attacks.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can see within 5 feet.

Failure: 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

Failure by 5 or More: While Poisoned, the target also has the Unconscious condition, which ends early if the target takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour.

Poisoned (Failure 5+).name: Poisoned (Failure 5+)
Poisoned (Failure 5+).description:
The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour.

The Poisoned target also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it awake.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't provoke an &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
Flyby.requirements: Flies out of an enemy's reach

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmTailStinger000]] attack.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (it can have up to three creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: The target is swallowed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the Grappled conditions end. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

Save.name: Save
Save.affectsSpecial: one Large or smaller creature Grappled

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has Total Cover against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Quasit.name: Quasit
Quasit.description:
Quasit

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5VW4pbLF5nwdO7II caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

32LONl1rUCtttKkg.name: Invisibility
32LONl1rUCtttKkg.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts to resemble a bat (Speed 10 ft., Fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., Climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., Swim 40 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Scare.name: 惊吓
Scare.description:
感知豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]]，单一生物位于[[lookup @range.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]]尺内。

豁免失败： 目标获得&Reference[Frightened apply=false]状态。在每个自己的回合结束时，目标重复此豁免，豁免成功则结束此效应。1分钟后，目标自动豁免成功。

Rakshasa.name: 罗刹
Rakshasa.description:
罗刹

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DMYEpWr3wvK4RLih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Greater Magic Resistance.name: 高等魔法抗性
Greater Magic Resistance.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]自动成功通过为抵抗法术或其他魔法效应而作的豁免检定，且法术的攻击检定自动失手。未经该[[lookup @name lowercase]]允许，任何法术都无法远程观察该[[lookup @name lowercase]]或侦测其思想、生物类型或阵营。

Fiendish Restoration.name: 魔能复苏
Fiendish Restoration.description: 如果[[lookup @name lowercase]]在焦炎地狱外死亡，它的身体会溶解成腐液，并立即在焦炎地狱获得一个新身体，以{全部 生命值： Hit Points}复活。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]发动三次[[/item .mmCursedTouch000]]攻击。

Cursed Touch.name: 诅咒缠身触及
Cursed Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。如果目标是一个生物，它将被诅咒缠身。在诅咒缠身期间，目标从完成一次短休或长休中无法获得任何效益。

Cursed.name: 诅咒缠身
Cursed.description: 受诅咒影响时，目标从完成一次短休或长休中无法获得任何效益。

Baleful Command.name: 恶意命令术
Baleful Command.description:
感知豁免: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], 每个[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]在[[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]尺光环内源自[[lookup @name lowercase]].

失败: [[/damage average]]伤害, 且目标获得&Reference[Frightened apply=false]和&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态直到[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下个回合开始.

Frightened & Incapacitated.name: 恐慌与失能
Frightened & Incapacitated.description: 目标陷入&Reference[Frightened apply=false]和&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态，直到使用者下个回合开始。

Spellcasting.name: 施法Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
该[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下法术之一，无需材料成分并使用魅力作为施法关键属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{侦测思想 Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{易容术 Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{法师之手 Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{次级幻影 Minor Illusion}

各1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{飞行术 Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{隐形术 Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{高等幻影 Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{异界传送 Plane Shift}

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在持续时间中，你感知到距你30尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以采取魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此效应由法术创造，则你得知该法术的魔法学派。

该法术会被1尺厚的石头、泥土或木头；1寸厚的金属；或一层薄铅板所阻挡。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你让自己——包括你的服饰、护甲、武器和随身携带的其他物品——在法术终止前看起来与平时不同。你可以使身高看起来缩短或增长1尺，体型显得更胖或更瘦。你必须采用与你自身肢体结构基本相同的形态。除此之外，幻象的具体程度由你决定。

该法术造成的变化经不起物理检验。例如，如果你用法术为自己添加一顶帽子，则物体可以穿过帽子，且任何触摸它的人将感觉空无一物。

要识破你的伪装，一个生物必须采取研究动作来检视你的外貌，并在一次对抗你法术豁免DC的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]]检定中成功。

Disguised.name: 易容
Disguised.description: 如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个{研究 Study}动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你{法术豁免DC spell save DC}的[[/check ability=int skill=inv]]检定。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在射程内你选择的一点。该手持续至持续时间结束。如果该手与你之间的距离超过30尺，或你再次施展此法术，则该手消失。

当你施展该法术时，你可以使用该手操纵一个物件，打开未上锁的门或容器，从打开的容器中存放或取出物品，或倒出小瓶中的内容物。

在你后续回合中，你可以以一个魔法动作再次如此控制该手。作为该动作的一部分，你可以将该手移动至多30尺。

该手无法攻击，激活魔法物品，或携带超过10磅的物品。

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。该幻术在你再次施展该法术时终止。

如果一个生物使用研究动作来检视该声响或影像，则该生物可以尝试一次[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]]检定对抗你的法术豁免DC，若成功则能判断出它是一个幻术。如果一个生物识别出这是一个幻术，则该幻术对该生物而言会变得模糊。

声响Sound. 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像Image. 如果你创造一个物件的影像——例如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印或一个小箱子——其尺寸不能超过一个5尺立方体。该影像无法创造声响、光亮、气味或任何其他感官效应。与该影像发生的物理互动会揭示它是一个幻术，因为物体可以穿透它。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。在法术持续时间内，目标获得60尺的{飞行速度 fly speed}且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中，则其随即坠落，除非其有办法阻止坠落。

使用更高法术位。你使用的法术位每比3环高一环，就可以多指定一个目标。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物获得&Reference[invisible apply=false]状态直到法术结束。在目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术后，此法术立即提前结束。

使用更高法术位。你使用的法术位每比2环高一级，就可以多以一个生物作为目标。

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Major Image.name: 高等幻影
Major Image.description:
你创造一个不大于20尺立方区域的物件、生物或其他可见现象的影像。该影像出现在施法范围内你能看见的一点，并在法术{持续时间 Duration}内持续存在。影像看起来十分真实，包括与所描绘事物相符的声音、气味和温度，但它无法造成{伤害 damage}或导致状态。

在该{幻术 Illusion}施法距离内时，你可以用一个{魔法 Magic}{动作 Action}将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个{生物 Creature}的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其{幻术 Illusion}的本质。一个{生物 Creature}可以用{检定 check}{动作 Action}来检视该影像，并通过一次成功的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]]{智力 Int}检定对抗你的{法术豁免DC spell save DC}来判定其为幻象。若某{生物 Creature}辨识出此为{幻术 Illusion}，则该{生物 Creature}可以{看穿 see through}该影像，且其{其他 other}感官特质对该{生物 Creature}而言会变得模糊。

使用更高{法术位 spell slot}。若使用4环或更高{法术位 spell slot}{施展 cast}该{法术 Spell}，则其{持续时间 Duration}持续至被驱散，且无需{专注 concentration}。

Plane Shift.name: 异界传送
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的自愿生物被传送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指定一个目标目的地，例如火元素位面的{黄铜之城 City of Brass}或九层地狱第二层{迪斯帕特 Dispater}的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在该目的地内或其附近。

另外，如果你知道另一个存在位面上的{传送法阵 teleportation circle}的印记序列，该法术可以将你带到该法阵。如果该{传送法阵 teleportation circle}太小而无法容纳所有你传送的生物，他们将出现在法阵旁边最近的未占据空间。

Rat.name: 老鼠
Rat.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Agile.name: 灵巧
Agile.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]离开敌人的触及范围时不会引发&Reference[opportunityattacks]{借机攻击 Opportunity Attack}。

Raven.name: 渡鸦
Raven.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Mimicry.name: 拟声
Mimicry.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以模仿它听过的简易声音，例如耳语或吱喳声。听者可以通过一次成功的[[/check format=long]]来辨别这些声音是模仿的。

成功: 半数伤害。

Reef Shark.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术

Remorhaz.description: 艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Heat Aura.description: 在[[lookup @name lowercase]]的每个回合结束时，每个位于以[[lookup @name lowercase]]为原点、[[lookup @target.template.size activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]]尺光环范围内的[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]]受到[[/damage average]]伤害。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。如果目标是[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]]生物，它将获得&Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），并且直到受擒结束前它都会处于&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态。

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒 & 束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: 如果目标是[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]]生物，它将陷入&Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]，具体DC见来源物品），并且在受擒状态结束前持续处于&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态。

Swallow.name: 吞咽
Swallow.description:
力量豁免: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] 被 [[lookup @name lowercase]] (它一次最多可以吞咽两个生物).

失败: 目标被 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 吞咽, 且受擒状态结束. 被吞咽的生物具有 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 和 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态, 它对 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 外部的攻击和其他效果具有 &Reference[Total Cover], 并在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的每个回合开始时受到 [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] 伤害.

如果 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在一个回合内从体内生物处受到 30 或更多伤害, [[lookup @name lowercase]] 必须在该回合结束时进行一次 [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] 否则将吐出所有被吞咽的生物, 每个生物会落在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] 尺内的空间并具有 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态. 如果 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 死亡, 任何被吞咽的生物不再具有束缚状态, 并可以通过使用 15 尺移动从尸体中逃脱, 脱离倒地状态.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.affectsSpecial: 一个大型或更小的生物受擒

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: 目盲, 束缚, 和全身掩护
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: 当被吞下时，生物处于&Reference[Blinded apply=false]和&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态，并获得针对攻击的&Reference[Total Cover apply=false]。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 如果你被吐出，你会落入10尺内的一个空间，并且处于&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态。

Rhinoceros.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Prone.name: 倒地

Riding Horse.description: 代币艺术作品由遗忘冒险提供。

Talons.name: 利爪
Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。如果目标是[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xdrDC5kFs6sCOFiE]]生物，它会因双爪获得&Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），并且在受擒结束前持续拥有&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态。

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒与束缚

Swoop.name: 俯冲

Expend Use.affectsSpecial: 如果鹏鸟擒住了一个生物，

Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次[[/item Tentacle]]攻击，使用[[/item Reel]]，并发动两次[[/item Bite]]攻击。

Tentacle.name: 触须
Tentacle.description:
[[/attack extended]]。命中： 目标因六条触须之一而陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），且目标获得 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至受擒状态结束。

触须可被破坏：当被摧毁时（AC 20，HP 10，免疫毒素和心灵伤害），可释放其擒住的生物。对触须造成伤害不会对[[lookup @name lowercase]]本体造成伤害，被摧毁的触须会在[[lookup @name lowercase]]下一回合开始时再生。

逃脱检定（DC见起源物品）

Antennae.name: 触角
Antennae.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 目标为一件[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]]物件——护甲或武器——该物件正被[[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]]尺内的一个生物穿着或携带。

敏捷豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]]，由携带该物件的生物进行。

失败： 该物件在提供的AC（护甲）或攻击骰（武器）上承受-1减值。若减值使护甲的AC降至10，则护甲被摧毁；若武器的减值达到-5，则武器被摧毁。该减值可以通过对护甲或武器施放@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]法术来移除。

Foundry 注

此特性还提供一个受损附魔系效果，将修改目标物件。由于装备减值可以多次施加，需要将此附魔从本物品的“效果”标签页拖拽至目标物品的属性表上。

Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.name: 受损：-1 {护甲等级 AC}/{攻击 Attack}
Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.description: 该{物件 Object}在提供的{护甲等级： AC}（{护甲 Armor}）或{攻击 Attack}骰（{武器 Weapon}）上承受-1减值。若减值使{护甲 Armor}的{护甲等级： AC}降至10，则{护甲 Armor}被摧毁；若{武器 Weapon}的减值达到-5，则{武器 Weapon}被摧毁。此减值可通过在{护甲 Armor}或{武器 Weapon}上施放@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]{法术 Spell}来移除。

Destroy Metal.name: 摧毁金属
Destroy Metal.description: 该[[lookup @name lowercase]]在自身[[lookup @range.value activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]尺范围内[[lookup @range.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]][[lookup @target.affects.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]。该[[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]的[[lookup @target.template.size activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]][[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]将被[[lookup @range.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]摧毁。
